scripts.test: start /B node src/server.js && timeout /t 3 && cucumber-js tests/features --require tests/steps --require tests/support --format progress --format html:tests/reports/cucumber-report.html && taskkill /F /IM node.exe
scripts.test:headless: start /B node src/server.js && timeout /t 3 && cucumber-js tests/features --require tests/steps --require tests/support && taskkill /F /IM node.exe
scripts.test:manual: cucumber-js tests/features --require tests/steps --require tests/support --format progress --format html:tests/reports/cucumber-report.html
